name: Space Invaders (itch) (chardymov)
description:
There is my Space Invaders game.

I added the following:

  • new levels 3 and 4
  • different music at all levels, and at level 4 completely new one
  • list of instructions
  • enemy random spawners in level 2, 3, 4
  • asteroids
  • Black Hole in level 4 that destroys everything

Credits

Vitalii Chardymov
